name: Tesla Model 3
description: All-electric sedan with cutting-edge technology, long driving range (up to ~340 miles), and quick acceleration. Popular for its Autopilot feature.

name: Mercedes-Benz C-Class
description: Stylish luxury sedan with refined interior, advanced tech, and smooth performance. Competes directly with BMW 3 Series.

name: Ford Mustang
description: Iconic American muscle car with powerful V8 options, sporty looks, and thrilling driving experience. Available in coupe and convertible.

name: Porsche 911 Carrera
description: Legendary German sports car known for timeless design, precision handling, and powerful turbocharged engines. A symbol of performance luxury.
